input_email_body:
Subject: Unforeseen Charges in My Subscription Plan

Hello Customer Service, I am contacting you to address a concern regarding my subscription. I recently found charges on my account that appear unaccounted for, possibly due to a billing system glitch. I have already reviewed my account details and billing records, but the problem remains unresolved. I would be grateful if you could investigate this further and offer a solution at your earliest convenience. If you require any more details to assist me, please let me know You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. I am hopeful that with your help, we can address this quickly and effectively. Thank you for your assistance in this matter. I eagerly await your response My name is Elena Ivanova.. Best regards, [Your Name]
